name: Kouryuu Sangoku Engi
overview: Kouryuu Sangoku Engi is a strategy game based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms, the game was also released in PC and Saturn. In the game the player can controls over the army, supplies. internal affairs, recruitments, diplomacy, etc. At the beginning of the game the player can choose between 5 different time periods (beginning in the year 184, 189, 195, 209 or 218)
